channel.title: KeyAuth c++ on mac or android
channel.description: Hello! I'm trying to use default KeyAuth c++ code, but I can't do that from mac because it needs Windows.h. My program will be for mobile, so it's very big problem if it can't work with any other platform except windows.

item.title: KeyAuth c++ on mac or android
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
You can technically DM me but I won’t respond. Updating the current KeyAuth examples is enough work, I have no interest adding another example for a platform far less used than Windows.

If you can’t figure it out yourself, you could pay someone. Cystemz#1337 on Discord may be interested. We’ve verified him as a merchant, meaning he’s reputable.

Here’s his post in the #offers channel of our Discord server KeyAuth

Title: General Programming and Software Security (Backend development, Discord bot development, Checkers, pretty much everything)

Programming Languages: C#, C++, Golang, and Javascript

Estimated Time: The time depends on the project and what I have going on at the time, I'll always try to give an accurate time frame if asked.

Typical Price: Also heavily depends, usually $100 to $300 but can be lower if its a simple project.

I can do pretty much anything anyone would want as long as it won't take months on end as at the moment I cannot commit to something like that.

If he’s not interested, you could look for someone on freelancer.com or a similar site to hire programmers.

Read full topic
item.source: KeyAuth c++ on mac or android

item.source: KeyAuth c++ on mac or android

item.title: KeyAuth c++ on mac or android
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
You may be able to remove certain parts of the C++ library code to make it work on other platforms. Not sure, I have a feeling cURL would work on other platforms.

Also, the documentation for non-encrypted API version is here Initialization - KeyAuth

Read full topic
